original_title: 8 Minutes and 46 Seconds: The Killing of George Floyd
overview: Sky Documentaries has reconstructed the death of George Floyd on May 25. Security footage, witness videos and official documents show how a series of actions by officers turned fatal.
tagline: For 8 minutes and 46 seconds, George Floyd was pinned to the ground with a policemanâ€™s knee on his neck.
title: 8 Minutes and 46 Seconds: The Killing of George Floyd
